headline: DIY - Your mini terrarium comes as a Do It Yourself package. It contains everything you need and step-by-step instructions to get started or We can build it for you
name: Ficus Ginseng
BestLocation: Grows best with medium light. Can't stand full or direct sun
plantNutrition: Additional plant nutrition is not necessary
about: The terrarium contains a Ficus Ginseng. You can recognize the Ficus Ginseng by its irregularly shaped aerial roots - Ginseng is Chinese for 'root' - and glossy oval leaves. Reminiscent of a bonsai tree, this Asian beauty is accompanied by two carefully selected botanicals.

name: Calathea Mason Jar Terrarium

headline: DIY - Your mini terrarium comes as a Do It Yourself package. It contains everything you need and step-by-step instructions to get started
name: Succulent Terrarium DIY
about: Next to the plants you will receive a glass pot of 100% recycled glass. We also supply the right amount of gravel, active charcoal and soil. And of course you will also receive an instruction for creating the terrarium.
BestLocation: Grows best with medium light. Can't stand full or direct sun
plantNutrition: Additional plant nutrition is not necessary
